  • Constructor Details

    • Barrier

      Barrier​(java.util.concurrent.Semaphore turnstile1, java.util.concurrent.Semaphore turnstile2, java.util.concurrent.Semaphore mutex, int[] count, int numOfThreads, int numOfPhases)
      Constructor for a Barrier object
      Parameters:
      turnstile1 - - turnstile for threads to stop upon arrival at phase one
      turnstile2 - - turnstile for threads to stop upon arrival at phase two
      mutex - - lock used to protect the critical section
      count - - Number of threads that arrived to the barrier
      numOfThreads - - Number of threads in total
      numOfPhases - - Number of times the threads pass through the barrier
